original_text: His descendants also included the people who lived in Jabez. They were people who could write down important things. Their clans were called the Tirathites, Shimeathites and Sucathites. These clans were descendants of Hammath, the Kenite man. He was also the ancestor of the Rekabites.
korean_text: 야베스에 살던 서기관 종족 곧 디랏 종족과 시므앗 종족과 수갓 종족이니 이는 다 레갑 가문의 조상 함맛에게서 나온 겐 종족이더라

sentences.original_text: His descendants also included the people who lived in Jabez.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 후손에는 또한 야베스에 사는 사람들이 포함되어 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They were people who could write down important things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 중요한 것들을 기록할 수 있는 사람들이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Their clans were called the Tirathites, Shimeathites and Sucathites.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 씨족은 디라이트, 시메아이트, 수가이트라고 불렸습니다.

sentences.original_text: These clans were descendants of Hammath, the Kenite man.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 씨족들은 겐인 사람인 함맛의 후손이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He was also the ancestor of the Rekabites.
